name: The Way to Dusty Death
description:
Content Warning: Mild adult themes, some language.

Press the Alt key to proceed.

Use the Arrow Keys to select.

  • Vectorpixelstar made the dialog frame I used. (https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/dialog-frames)
  • Both pieces of music are classical guitar/lute pieces (one of which is Wilson’s Wilde from Dowland’s lute book.)
